dict.acceptation: 广泛地；普遍地；到处；大量地；

sent.orig: Mr Sarkozy's move was widely denounced across the EU – but then equally widely imitated.
sent.trans: 萨尔科齐先生的退出在欧盟广受批评——却也同样广受效仿。

sent.orig: Read widely is the importance path which open widely knowledge noodles.
sent.trans: 博览群书是拓宽知识面的重要途径。

sent.orig: The calcite twin lamellae method can be used widely because calcite veins widely develop in faults.
sent.trans: 由于方解石脉双晶纹发育的广泛性，使之具有推广价值。

sent.orig: Nexium, Preacid and Prilosec are all powerful heartburn drugs, widely promoted and just as widely used.
sent.trans: 拉唑镁，兰索拉唑和奥美拉唑都是强效的治疗胃灼热药物，被广泛推广和使用。

sent.orig: The shift is sure to be widely discussed and widely misinterpreted.
sent.trans: 这种转变当然会引起广泛的讨论与误解。
